violations: Worker in dangerous position under falling objects
Materials improperly secured, leading to potential falling hazards
locations: Center of the image, where wooden planks are falling
Ground level, scattered around the site
Wooden planks at the top portion of the site
recommendations: Ensure all workers are equipped with proper PPE including hard hats and vests.
Keep workers out of areas with potential falling hazards and use proper safety barriers.
Regularly clean the site to remove debris and reduce tripping hazards.
Secure all materials properly to prevent them from falling and causing injuries.
